Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to labeling requirements for electric assisted bicycles
Summary: Prohibits the sale of electric assisted bicycles unless the packaging contains a notice stating that the operation of such electric assisted bicycle on any public highway, road or sidewalk may be unlawful.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ggg, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to labeling requirements for electric assisted bicycles
